channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - git

item.title: Some changes under the hood
item.description:
In between conferences, technical writing jobs and traveling, we did a few changes under the hood for SELinux in Gentoo.

First of all, new policies are bumped and also stabilized (2.20130411-r3 is now stable, 2.20130411-r5 is \~arch). These have a few updates (mergers from upstream), and r5 also â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
